ACK

I've checked that  
91ef8344d4de28b0a659401ef5fefee6c3d9f7ae passes unit and functional tests locally, and the keys used match the proposed update to BIP32 in https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1030/commits/b0521f076c0b40208e82208f5476c48071aab785.
Nit: we usually update the copyright years once a year in bulk
Yes, but will this hurt? Script will just ignore this one, right?
No, that's why it's just a nit :)
